sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PmSrcUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PmSrcUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PmSrcUtil = Class.create();
PmSrcUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'PmSrcUtil'
};

PmSrcUtil.getSource = function(scriptIncludeName) {
   gs.log("Into PmSrcUtil.getSource: " + scriptIncludeName);
   if( scriptIncludeName ) {
      var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script_include');
      gr.get('name', scriptIncludeName);
      return gr.getValue('script');
   }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-03-10 12:52:56</sys_created_on>

        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PmSrcUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_07b7b0d09f32310088265bb0657fcf39</sys_update_name>
